p: In addition to protein kinases, some lipid kinases have been targeted by antivirals. One example is sphingosine kinase 1, which affects replication of dengue virus ( Aloia et al., 2017). Its activity can be determined by measuring the production of 32P-labeled sphingosine-1-phosphate from sphingosine and [Î³ 32P]ATP ( Clarke et al., 2016, Pitman et al., 2012).
